Yoonsang Lee

CS PhD @ Princeton
yoonsang at princeton dot edu

Hello! I am a Ph.D. student in Computer Science at Princeton University, advised by Danqi Chen. Prior to that, I was an undergrad at Seoul National University, fortunate to be working with Eunsol Choi.

My research focuses on NLP, where I am interested in making large language models better utilize dynamic information and acquire meaningful knowledge.

Recently, I‚Äôve been thinking about Retrieval-augmented generation, Deep research agents, and Human-AI interaction. Feel free to reach out for collaboration!
